channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 5.A - Developing with Containers Developing with Containers Dockerfile Docker Compose Develop in Docker CI/CD Pipelines Dockerfile # For more information, please refer to https://aka.ms/vscode-docker-python FROM python:3.8-slim EXPOSE 5000 # Keeps Python from generating .pyc files in the container ENV PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1 # Turns off buffering for easier container logging ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 # Install pip requirements COPY requirements.txt . RUN python -m pip install -r requirements.txt WORKDIR /app COPY .
